self.name: auth.sendCode
self.descriptionExcerpt: Send the verification code for login

arguments.name: settings
arguments.description: Settings for the code type to send

throws.description: This API id was published somewhere, you can't use it now
throws.name: API_ID_PUBLISHED_FLOOD

throws.description: The temporary auth key must be binded to the permanent auth key to use these methods.
throws.name: AUTH_KEY_PERM_EMPTY

throws.description: Repeat the query to data-center X
throws.name: NETWORK_MIGRATE_X

throws.description: Repeat the query to data-center X
throws.name: PHONE_MIGRATE_X

throws.description: You can't sign up using this app
throws.name: PHONE_NUMBER_APP_SIGNUP_FORBIDDEN

throws.description: The provided phone number is banned from telegram
throws.name: PHONE_NUMBER_BANNED

throws.description: You asked for the code too many times.
throws.name: PHONE_NUMBER_FLOOD

throws.description: You have tried logging in too many times
throws.name: PHONE_PASSWORD_FLOOD

throws.description: An error occurred while creating the SMS code
throws.name: SMS_CODE_CREATE_FAILED
